summary: Build a single-page romantic animated Valentine proposal website with a soft dreamy aesthetic, interactive YES/NO proposal flow, playful prevention of selecting NO, and a celebration screen with photo, animations, and optional music.
architectural_notes: Single-page app-style experience with two scenes (Proposal and Celebration) and smooth animated transitions.
Use performant animations (CSS transforms/opacity, requestAnimationFrame for particle effects) and optimize for mobile + desktop responsiveness.

Use a typography pairing of a romantic cursive headline font plus a clean modern body font, applied consistently across the site.
